english.segment1: Okay, You're right. I cannot fight this all alone. Let in the light i need to know
english.segment2: Your line of love goes on and on. Drawn in a circle, drawn upon. My heart and i can't erase it
english.segment3: This line of love connecting me. To You, forever knowing. When i fall You'll help me to face it
english.segment4: Facing myself. Hasn't been easy. Can't hide any longer. Those days are through
english.segment5: Your line of love goes on and on. Leads to a place where i belong. Where mercy waits to embrace me
english.segment6: This line of love that draws me in. Forgiving forgetting my sin. And in Your grace it has traced me
